channel.title: OpenCV on Yuanbo Han
channel.description: Recent content in OpenCV on Yuanbo Han

item.title: Panoramic Photo Generation
item.description: Use Python and OpenCV to generate a cylindrical panoramic image from an all-around video. Techniques include: Key frame selection SIFT (Scale Invariant Feature Transform) Matching RANSAC (Random Sample Consens) Cylindrical Projection Image Blending (Linear, Laplacian) Image Cropping The project report written by LaTeX is available here.
